permafrost.tundra.io

Class StreamHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.io.StreamHelper

  • public class StreamHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with streams.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_BUFFER_SIZE
      The default buffer size used by Tundra.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void close(java.io.Closeable... closeables)
      Closes all given closeable objects, suppressing any encountered java.io.IOExceptions.

      Copies all data from the given input stream to the given output stream, and then closes both streams.

      Copies all data from the given input stream to the given output stream, and optionally closes both streams.

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                        java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                        boolean close)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copies all data from the given input stream to the given output stream, and optionally closes both streams.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - An input stream containing data to be copied.
        outputStream - An output stream to where the copied data will be written.
        close - When true, both the input and output streams will be closed when done.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading from or writing to the streams.

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                        java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copies all data from the given input stream to the given output stream, and then closes both streams.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - An input stream containing data to be copied.
        outputStream - An output stream to where the copied data will be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading from or writing to the streams.

      • copy

        public static void copy(java.io.Reader reader,
                        java.io.Writer writer)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Copies all the data from the given reader to the given writer, then closes both.
        Parameters:
        reader - The reader to copy data from.
        writer - The writer to copy data to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is a problem reading from the reader or writing to the writer.
